definition.text: You may work with any of the markets listed at the exchange! Take a look at the setup in the Exchange Markets node!

paragraphs.text: I'm not going to explain how to set up new markets as the topic is covered in the Install a New Market Tutorial in the Tested Exchanges Plugin Workspace. I just wanted to let you know that it's easy!
Take a look at the menu of the BTC/USDT Market! Notice the Install Market and Uninstall Market buttons! That's how you do it!
I'll leave it at that and let you do the Install a New Market Tutorial when the time is right!
